game

Interface MoveNotifier

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AIPlayer, HumanPlayer, Player, Socket

    public interface MoveNotifier
    Interface providing two way notifying service for moves. Joins Observer and Observable under one interface. Update() method should be called by specific notyfyXXXObserver() method to updateMove Observer with given move. setMasterObserver() should be called by Master observer while creating a Slave.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addSlaveObserver(MoveNotifier observer)
      Adds lower rank observer MoveNotifier#updateMove(client.Room.MoveNotifier, utilities.messages.Move) method.
      void notifyMasterObserverAboutMessage(Message msg)
      Notifies observer higher in rank with given message.
      void notifyMasterObserverAboutMove(Move move)
      Notifies observer lover in rank with given move.
      void notifySlaveObserversAboutMessage(Message msg)
      Notifies all observers lower in rank with given message.
      void notifySlaveObserversAboutMove(Move move)
      Notifies all observers lower in rank with given move.
      void setMasterObserver(MoveNotifier observer)
      Changes higher rank observer which will be notified through MoveNotifier#updateMove(client.Room.MoveNotifier, utilities.messages.Move) method.
      void updateMessage(MoveNotifier src, Message msg)
      Method called by Master/Slave Observable for passing lower/higher various messages.
      void updateMove(MoveNotifier src, Move move)
      Method called by Master/Slave Observable strictly for passing lower/higher moves.

    • Method Detail

      • setMasterObserver

        void setMasterObserver(MoveNotifier observer)
        Changes higher rank observer which will be notified through MoveNotifier#updateMove(client.Room.MoveNotifier, utilities.messages.Move) method.
        Parameters:
        observer - Master observer
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if move is null pointer.

      • addSlaveObserver

        void addSlaveObserver(MoveNotifier observer)
        Adds lower rank observer MoveNotifier#updateMove(client.Room.MoveNotifier, utilities.messages.Move) method. There might be only one slave in implementing class thus this method should be used strictly by implementing class
        Parameters:
        observer - Slave observer
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if move is null pointer.

      • notifyMasterObserverAboutMove

        void notifyMasterObserverAboutMove(Move move)
        Notifies observer lover in rank with given move.
        Parameters:
        move - Move to notify a master about.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if move is null pointer.

      • notifySlaveObserversAboutMove

        void notifySlaveObserversAboutMove(Move move)
        Notifies all observers lower in rank with given move.
        Parameters:
        move - Move to notify a slaves about.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if move is null pointer.

      • notifyMasterObserverAboutMessage

        void notifyMasterObserverAboutMessage(Message msg)
        Notifies observer higher in rank with given message. Moves should be strictly send by notifyXXXObserveraboutMove()
        Parameters:
        msg - Message to notify a master about.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if msg is null pointer.

      • notifySlaveObserversAboutMessage

        void notifySlaveObserversAboutMessage(Message msg)
        Notifies all observers lower in rank with given message. Moves should be strictly send by notifyXXXObserveraboutMove()
        Parameters:
        msg - Message to notify a slaves about.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if msg is null pointer.

      • updateMove

        void updateMove(MoveNotifier src,
                Move move)
        Method called by Master/Slave Observable strictly for passing lower/higher moves.
        Parameters:
        src - Source of move
        move - move sent by source.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if move is null pointer.

      • updateMessage

        void updateMessage(MoveNotifier src,
                   Message msg)
        Method called by Master/Slave Observable for passing lower/higher various messages. This method should not be used for passing Moves, rather for new board or messages.
        Parameters:
        src - Source of move
        msg - msg sent by source.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if move is null pointer.
